segments.text: Good morning . Welcome to Time After Time Watches .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to buy a watch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you've come to the right place . What kind of watch are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'm not sure . Let's see . How much is this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . I don't think I can afford that . How about this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . That's too much for me . Don't you have anything cheaper ?
segments.speaker: S2
